intro: Psychotria flaviflora, commonly known as the yellow-flowered psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Brazil and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of bright yellow flowers that bloom in the summer months. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland tropical forests. The plant's botanical features make it an important component of its native ecosystems.
